title: Boat Magazines - September 29 2014 (True PDF)
description:
Boat Magazines - September 29, 2014 (True PDF)

5 Issues | True PDF | English | 104 MB Total 


=============================================
=============================================


Boating - October 2014  USA

100 Pages | True PDF | English | 16 MB

Boating is the world's foremost magazine for boating enthusiasts. Written by experts for those who love the sport, the editorial covers the waterfront -- from runabouts to sportfish convertibles to luxury showpieces, and everything in between.

=============================================

Classic Boat - October 2014  UK

100 Pages | True PDF | English | 16 MB

Admire the world's most beautiful boats, brought to life through breath-taking photography. Classic Boat offers a unique blend of yacht reviews, seamanship and restoration features, history and design columns, practical advice and coverage of the leading international regattas and events. Whether your interest lies in working on restoration projects or sailing in classic regattas; whether you're a wooden boat owner or simply an admirer of traditional marine workmanship, Classic Boat will have something for you.

=============================================

Practical Boat Owner - October 2014  UK

120 Pages | True PDF | English | 26 MB

Practical Boat Owner is the UKÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best selling sailing magazine. Established over 40 years ago and published 13 times a year its mission is to inform readers on how best to maintain and use their boat. Packed with practical know how from buying a boat to modifying, repairing, restoring or kitting out with the latest electronic equipment, PBO has it covered. There is also a comprehensive listing section featuring the latest pre owned boats and equipment for sale as well as other marine services. 

=============================================

Sailing Today - November 2014  UK

104 Pages | True PDF | English | 25 MB

Sailing Today is a UK based sail cruising magazine catering for sailors who sail their boats, not just talk about it at the yacht club bar. Whether you are crossing the local lake, the Channel or circumnavigating the world, our new and used boat tests, our step by step practical articles and in-depth gear tests, will provide you with the essential expert information you need to get the best out of your sailing. 

=============================================

Sailing World - October 2014  USA

114 Pages | True PDF | English | 19 MB

#1 source of news and information on sailboat racing at every level.  Exclusive in-depth coverage of races and events, Latest sailing trends, Expert racing instruction and time-shaving technical tips, Unbiased reviews of the latest boats, equipment and technology, and Stunning photography.
